CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
CurrentVersion.description: With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
OldVersion.description: With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
OldVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Multilayer structuring, customization, and branding for learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: This feature set brings new functionality to learning academies. Multi-layer structuring allows users to organize content and learning paths under multiple levels. Branding capabilities include the customization of the academy logo and the background image. Customization allows users to hide or show individual components of an academy like featured sets and  learner profile cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add links to content in featured set
CurrentVersion.description: Global administrators/knowledge administrators can now add links to content sets in Viva Learning. These links can direct users to content stored internally with services like SharePoint and Stream or found online through YouTube, Vimeo, and other sources. The capability to add links to content allows admins to add content found online to featured sets, in addition to formal learning courses from connected providers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add links to content in featured set
OldVersion.description: Global administrators/knowledge administrators can now add links to content sets in Viva Learning. These links can direct users to content stored internally with services like SharePoint and Stream or found online through YouTube, Vimeo, and other sources. The capability to add links to content allows admins to add content found online to featured sets, in addition to formal learning courses from connected providers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
CurrentVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
OldVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
CurrentVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
OldVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
CurrentVersion.description: Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
OldVersion.description: Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search experience in OneDrive Web
CurrentVersion.description: OneDrive for web now lets you find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search functionality. Say goodbye to the days of endlessly scrolling through folders to find that one elusive document. With our latest update, locating your files is now faster and more intuitive than ever before. Whether it's in your personal OneDrive, shared folders, or document libraries, our improved search feature allows you to seamlessly sift through your digital workspace from one centralized location. We've added new filters for different file types, ensuring you can pinpoint exactly what you're looking for and with the date filter, you can narrow down your search results to find files created or modified within a specific timeframe. We understand that searching within a folder or document library is important to you, and for that, we have simplified scoping options that will enable precise searches within folders, sites, or document libraries. We've also visually updated the interface with more metadata, ensuring you effortlessly identify the right files every time.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search experience in OneDrive Web
OldVersion.description: OneDrive for web now lets you find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search functionality. Say goodbye to the days of endlessly scrolling through folders to find that one elusive document. With our latest update, locating your files is now faster and more intuitive than ever before. Whether it's in your personal OneDrive, shared folders, or document libraries, our improved search feature allows you to seamlessly sift through your digital workspace from one centralized location. We've added new filters for different file types, ensuring you can pinpoint exactly what you're looking for and with the date filter, you can narrow down your search results to find files created or modified within a specific timeframe. We understand that searching within a folder or document library is important to you, and for that, we have simplified scoping options that will enable precise searches within folders, sites, or document libraries. We've also visually updated the interface with more metadata, ensuring you effortlessly identify the right files every time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Security settings in the Microsoft Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with a dedicated experience to manage specific settings that help improve the security posture of their managed browser instances.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Security settings in the Microsoft Edge management service
OldVersion.description: The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with a dedicated experience to manage specific settings that help improve the security posture of their managed browser instances.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Topic Subscription notification
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to subscribe to notifications for Viva Engage topics they follow. Users would receive a Teams and Engage bell notification whenever a new post is tagged with a topic they are subscribed to or the topic is added to an existing post.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Topic Subscription notification
OldVersion.description: This feature allows users to subscribe to notifications for Viva Engage topics they follow. Users would receive a Teams and Engage bell notification whenever a new post is tagged with a topic they are subscribed to or the topic is added to an existing post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
CurrentVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
OldVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Users can scope suggestions to specific entities in the new Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to scope their search suggestions down to specific entities such as Files, People, Mail etc in order to sort through their suggestions more easily. They will be able to navigate from the suggestion directly to the entity tab in their search results. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Users can scope suggestions to specific entities in the new Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to scope their search suggestions down to specific entities such as Files, People, Mail etc in order to sort through their suggestions more easily. They will be able to navigate from the suggestion directly to the entity tab in their search results. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
CurrentVersion.description: Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
OldVersion.description: Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
OldVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Document library card for Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This card will help operators add a card which will show all the files inside a directory for quick access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New security and certification information available for apps and extensions
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will equip administrators evaluating apps and
copilot extensions for deployment with extensive security and related certification data to help those admins more quickly evaluate that an app and/or extension complies with their tenant security requirements. Initially, the information provided will include results
from individual M365 certification tests and evidence submitted by ISVs during
Microsoft's audit of their app or copilot extension. Additionally, for
non-certified apps, admins will receive details on data handling, security, and
compliance as self-attested by the ISV.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing archival and other enforcement actions with inactive site lifecycle management policy
CurrentVersion.description: Address inactive content on your tenant with inactive sites policy. Admins can configure policies to Detect inactive sites, send notifications to all site owners, and archive these sites or put them in a read-only state if there is no action from notification recipients.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search - query suggestions
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can form search queries quickly and efficiently with enhanced people-query suggestions. Start typing a person name in the search bar, and get recommendations based on results most relevant to you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.
